title: goerli is often behind block number
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
delvel

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Ubuntu 20.04.5 LTS (GNU/Linux 5.15.0-1031-aws x86_64)

Commit hash: 
./build/bin/erigon --datadir="/erigon/goerli" --chain=goerli --port=30303 --http.port=8545 --authrpc.port=8551 --torrent.port=42069 --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9090 --http --ws --http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool --http.corsdomain=* --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.vhosts=*

Erigon Command (with flags/config):

Concensus Layer:

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

Chain/Network: 
Goerli
#### Expected behaviour

Can produce blocks normally and stably synchronously without falling behind
#### Actual behaviour
Often lags behind blocks, sometimes happens after running for hours, sometimes running for days

#### 
It runs on a 4-core 32G machine with nvme hard disk, so I guess the performance of the machine is not a problem

